meanings.definition: A long, flat muscle that runs down the length of the thigh.
meanings.sent1: The sartorius muscle helps in bending the knee.
meanings.sent2: She felt a twinge in her sartorius after running a marathon.
meanings.sent3: The sartorius muscle decided to take a break during the race.
meanings.sent4: His sartorius was as strong as a steel cable.
meanings.sent5: The sartorius muscle looked like a thin ribbon under the skin.

meanings.sent1: She admired the sartorius skills of the tailor.
meanings.sent2: The sartorius details on the dress were exquisite.
meanings.sent3: The sartorius design of the costume was unique.
meanings.sent4: His sartorius craftsmanship was unmatched in the town.
meanings.sent5: The sartorius stitches held the fabric together perfectly.
